item.title: Colored Whips [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Puffscape Puffscape
item.description:
@Puffscape wrote:

The model is probably messed up.

… You really have to learn the basics…
Combatassistant.java.
Search “Case 4151:” in it and add “Case YOUR NEW WHIP ID:” under every single one you see… Pretty simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Colored Whips [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DynastyRSPS DynastyRSPS
item.description:
@DynastyRSPS wrote:

[quote=“h3rbl0re, post:1, topic:384052”]Ok, so i have the whip model id, but when i wear it in the game, its curls up in my hand. I dont know if you know that i mean by that, but like in rs when you run with a whip, it curls up in your hand. I want it to dangle down like other whips. heres my id:

[quote]case 15441:
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1];
itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1];
itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 8128;
itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 944;
itemDef.modelID = 5412;
itemDef.anInt165 = 5409;
itemDef.anInt200 = 5409;
itemDef.modelZoom = 840;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 280;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.name = “Abyssal Whip (Green)”;
itemDef.description = “An abyssal whip colored green.”.getBytes();
break;[/quote][/quote]

The model is probably messed up.

Read full topic

item.title: Colored Whips [PI]
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

Ok, so i have the whip model id, but when i wear it in the game, its curls up in my hand. I dont know if you know that i mean by that, but like in rs when you run with a whip, it curls up in your hand. I want it to dangle down like other whips. heres my id:

case 15441: itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 8128; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 944; itemDef.modelID = 5412; itemDef.anInt165 = 5409; itemDef.anInt200 = 5409; itemDef.modelZoom = 840; itemDef.modelRotationY = 280; itemDef.modelRotationX = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.name = "Abyssal Whip (Green)"; itemDef.description = "An abyssal whip colored green.".getBytes(); break;

Read full topic
